page.title: 05SALMONHUTCH CUB CAMP 1985
page.content: On the week-end of June 14th to 16th 1st Crediton Cubs and Scouts went on camp to Salmonhutch.We stayed in a field next to the River Yeo.On the farm owned by Mr Mortimer of Uton. {FRIDAY:- We were taken out by our parents at 6.30pm and were shown to our tents.The cubs from our class (3rd year)were Leigh,Chris,Martin,Richard,Mark & Simon.After we had sorted all our things out we had supper,we had hotdogs.After supper we had a game of cricket and then we went to bed at 10.30, we didn't get much sleep! {SATURDAY:- We all woke up at 5.30 and found that dew was all over the grass.We were allowed out of the tent at 6.30 and played until 7.30 then we did keep fit before breakfast.After breakfast, went down to river. The river was
